asset.name: QW_TransCon_PTH
asset.mechanism: Once-weekly TransCon prodrug designed to match YORVIPATH exposure over entire week
asset.one_liner: Preclinical once-weekly TransCon PTH prodrug designed to match YORVIPATH daily exposure over an entire week for improved convenience in hypoparathyroidism

biology.simple_explanation: The PTH receptor mediates parathyroid hormone signaling that controls calcium and phosphate balance. This once-weekly formulation aims to sustain PTH levels equivalent to daily YORVIPATH dosing, reducing injection burden for patients with hypoparathyroidism who are already stable on TransCon PTH therapy.

indications_in_development: Hypoparathyroidism targeting patients on stable YORVIPATH doses
